alert.note: Alert for Western El Paso County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 5:50PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Dona Ana and western El Paso Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 450 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles southwest of Afton to 12 miles southwest of Santa Teresa. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West El Paso, Santa Teresa, Sunland Park, La Union, Union Pacific Intermodal Terminal, Mount Riley, and Kilbourne Hole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
